WAR CABIJIST^G.T. 2189,a ATTITUDE OF BRITISH AM) ggNCH rffffTONTOTTSTOWARDS RUSSIA..iCopy of telegram No*.,S06., dated 1st October 1917 from Lord ReadingsFor British War Cabinet from Reading: Have gathered from conversation with House that Russian authorities here are representing to United States administration that British and French Governments are not showing sufficient sympathy with difficulties of Russian re'gime. They are apprehensive that British in particular are not disinclined to revert reactionary role while French ar.^ not really sympathetic. Promised House to request influence may be brought'on Ministers to express and on press to show more sympathetic tone.
